---
title: Submit Signed Add Proxy Transaction for Broadcast
slug: /guides/staking-api/polkadot/add-staking-proxy/submit-signed-add-proxy-transaction
---

After signing the transaction, send a `PUT` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next`. The Staking API will broadcast the transaction to the Polkadot network.

### Parameters

- `name` &mdash; `string` Name of the action to execute (required).
- `inputs` &mdash; `object`
  - `transaction_payload` &mdash; Signed transaction payload from the previous step's response.

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash {5-8}
curl -X PUT 'https://polkadot-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/5d2a7dc6-0f7c-41a5-bbb6-fb27b2e16a9b/next' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
-d '{
	"name": "sign_add_proxy_tx",
  "inputs": {
    "transaction_payload": "0x390284009864ac6455584af3c38540ec03927eca126342d266d3c9b62e44b41844a3166601665fc2eaae2fa8bdd6b7be7f0aaec5081ed2f45d54910cf6695a5795f329c262331af7f0803768c510a59fd45b7f81f0a01c4c393504a50a790545ec3f99538a000400160100067452e7828dafb80be77c82b33a3781e71de7d04096aad144cfac000a7fd2400200000000"
  }
}'
```

### Response

With the signed transaction provided, Staking API will broadcast it to the network. As the transaction progresses towards confirmation, the returned state will be either:

- `add_proxy_tx_broadcasting` &mdash; Transaction has been broadcast and is waiting confirmation.
- `registered` &mdash; Transaction has been confirmed and the proxy is complete.

#### Sample Response

```json {4,8}
{
  "id": "5d2a7dc6-0f7c-41a5-bbb6-fb27b2e16a9b",
  "operation": "add_proxy",
  "state": "add_proxy_tx_broadcasting",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2023-02-28T19:28:27.209Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "proxy_account_address": "5HDojdfR1Vm9dnDYEB4JQyxgcgH3aHHeWgE9jqarBkChULRJ",
    "proxied_account_address": "5FNVfA6qhVJBKrG4KCo6CLzvcXVRRdiGpsYHbkzujMUG6JJG",
    "add_proxy_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "0x160100e41e2a54397e0657cb58d978d0f2a9201a84b3d953a83780df5795a1006ecf7d0200000000000800a424000013000000e143f23803ac50e8f6f8e62695d1ce9e4e1d68aa36c1cd2cfd15340213f3423ee143f23803ac50e8f6f8e62695d1ce9e4e1d68aa36c1cd2cfd15340213f3423e",
      "signed": "0x3902840092460dcf0b9ae6cabf654c1b33f02f52934d1ae262f8db733b470b631c5871650168412eb87861dfec907b59f82abc2bd30f8e79b03d899af35a0edb2c250d797238e124dc5beffb808f10f397b89116262f96f3d138483a094e0b5b9032394b88000800160100e41e2a54397e0657cb58d978d0f2a9201a84b3d953a83780df5795a1006ecf7d0200000000",
      "hash": "0xb1460239a2a02c504aff2482d0461454f0a4c73033f14f5b96827a8d6f7b464e",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [],
      "block_time": null,
      "block_number": 14838468,
      "proxy": null
    }
  },
  "network_code": "polkadot",
  "chain_code": "westend",
  "created_at": "2023-02-28T19:11:38.281Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-28T19:27:27.188Z"
}
```
